newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks end down over political uncertainty.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks end down over political uncertainty.

text.p: Dhaka stocks continued to fall in a bearish market as investors, panicked by the looming political uncertainty, remained on the sidelines, brokers said.

The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all-share price index closed 19.52 points or 1.27 percent down at 1,583.93 on a turnover of 76.6 million taka. Of 118 traded issues 73 lost, 40 gained and five unchanged.

"The market was nervous due to opposition threat to launch anti-government protest. The investors are watching the market," said a broker. Singer Bangladesh shed to 346 to 12,253, Bata Shoe rose 1.95 to 183 and Apex Foods lost 272.04 to 2,819.67.
